data.eml:eml: An updated list of the type specimens of Caelifera (Orthoptera) in the Museu Nacional, Rio de Janeiro

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Monné, Miguel A. (2018): An updated list of the type specimens of Caelifera (Orthoptera) in the Museu Nacional, Rio de Janeiro. Zootaxa 4462 (1): 73-99, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4462.1.3
